text: Get Hard is an American comedy movie. Alison Brie plays Alissa. Kevin Hart plays Darnell. ==Cast== * Will Ferrell as James King * Kevin Hart as Darnell Lewis * Alison Brie as Alissa Barrow * Edwina Findley as Rita Lewis * Craig T. Nelson as Martin Barrow * T.I. as Russell * Ariana Neal as Makayla Lewis * Greg Germann as Peter Penny * Paul Ben-Victor as Gayle * Dan Bakkedahl as Leo * Erick Chavarria as Cecelio * Jon Eyez as Big Mike * Nito Larioza as Jaoa * Ron Funches as Jojo * John Mayer as himself * Jimmy Fallon as himself ==Production== On December 7, 2012, it was announced that Warner Bros. was in talks to acquire the Get Hard comedy movie script. On September 17, 2013, Etan Cohen was set to direct. On February 24, 2014, Warner Bros. set the release date for 27 March 2015. ===Release=== The movie was released on 27 March 2015 in the United States. ===Reception=== It got negative reviews by movie critics. Rotten Tomatoes gave the movie 29%. Metacritic rates the movie 34 out of 100, meaning "generally unfavorable reviews". ===Box office=== Get Hard made over $105 million overall. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2015 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies
